name: The Rabbit's Foot
description:
Play as a kung fu rabbit fighting a ninja tortoise and his shark assassins in this short beat-em-up prototype

  • Move left and right with the Arrow Keys
  • Attack with a 3 hit combo and a dive kick with the D key
  • Stagger enemies with a heavy kick with the S key
  • Jump out of harm's way with the A key
  • Dodge through attacks with the Shift key
  • Heal at any time with the W key

Art, concept and design by Don-Niel Saunders.

Programming and development by Jonathan B. Miller.

Background Music by Zlender.

Made with Unity.
